full_text: ees Seen Beast 2019/KER/29 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW THURSDAY ,THE 03RD DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 13TH POUSHA, 1940 Crl1.MC.No. 22 of 2019 AGAINST CP 30/2017 of J.M.F.C-I, PERUMBAVOOR CRIME NO. 1349/2017 OF Perumbavoor Police Station , Ernakulam PETITIONERS /ACCUSED NO.1 TO 3: 1 JALAL, AGED 41 YEARS, S/O SULAIMAN, CHIRACKAKUDY HOUSE, VENGOLA VILLAGE ,ALLAPRA KARA, PERUMBAVOOR, ERNARULAM DISTRICT. 2 SALIM, AGED 41 YEARS, S/O VEERAN, KARIMBANACKAL HOUSE, VENGOLA VILLAGE ,ALLAPRA KARA, PERUMBAVOOR, ERNARULAM DISTRICT. 3 SUDHEESH, AGED 36 YEARS, S/O NARAYANAN, PERALAYIL HOUSE, MARAMPILLY VILLAGE ,MANJAPPETTY KARA, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT BY ADV. SRI.P.P.BIJU Seen Elz 2019/KER/29 CrL.M.C, 22/19 -122- RESPONDENTS/STATE & COMPLAINANT: 1 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM 2 SURESH AGED 39 YEARS, S/O SUKUMARAN, AMBALATHVILA HOUSE, KULASEKHARAN VILLAGE ,MANIYAMKUDY KARA, KANNYAKUMARI DISTRICT, STATE OF TAMILNADU. BY ADV. SRI.ANISH PAUL SRI.ALEX M.THOMBRA, SR. PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 03.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: BSE or, 2019/KER/29 Crl.M.C. 22/19 -:3:- ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. Petitioners are accused in C.P. No.30 of 2017 on the file of the Judicial Magistrate of First Class-l, Perumbavoor registered for the offences under Sections 308, 341 and 427 IPC. The 2 respondent is the victim. It is submitted that the matter has been settled and the proceedings in the trial court may be quashed. 3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioners and the second respondeni and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4. | have perused the affidavit filed by the second respondent, who has entered appearance through counsel. | am satisfied that the matter has been settled and no public interest is involved in this case. There is no impediment for granting the prayer of the petitioners. In the result, this Crl.M.C is allowed. The proceedings in C.P. No.30 of 2017 on the file of the Judicial Magistrate of First Class-l, Perumbavoor are quashed. If any material objects have been produced in this case, the trial court may pass appropriate orders for their disposal. Sdi/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW, JUDGE vps 4/1 Boe Bre pment Le A Ua rea 2019/KER/29 Crl.M.C. 22/19 -:4:- APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE 1 TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO 1349/2017 OF PERUMBAVOOR, POLICE STATION, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT ANNEXURE 11 ORIGINAL OF THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT RESPONDENT'S/S' EXHIBITS: NIL /True Copy/ vps PS to Judge
